name: Gold Miner (FL1PPY)
description:
Mine as much gold as you can. But you must be careful. All that glitten is not gold!

Gold Miner is an  First Person Adventure Game where player searches for gold nuggets and tries to avoid the fake ones.  The Lamp and The pickaxe may be really useful in this quest!

CREDITS:

Game Design: Flippy

Programming: Flippy

3D Art: Flippy

2D Art: Flippy

Level Design: Flippy

Sound Design: Flippy

Every Asset in the game has been created by myself.

The only exception is Cave Ambience:  

https://freesound.org/people/julius_galla/sounds/232685/
